title: Hulk.and.the.Agents.of.S.M.A.S.H.Galactus.Goes.Green.480p.DVDRip
description:
Marvel's Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. - Season 1 - Episode ?? (DVDRip - 480p)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Villains beware because some of Marvel's strongest superheroes -- Hulk,
She-Hulk, A-Bomb, Red Hulk and Skaar -- are banding together. The members
of the group, Agents of S.M.A.S.H., are setting out to prove that are they
are not monsters but rather Hulk-sized heroes. The heroes live together so
in addition to tackling worldwide threats, such as trying to prevent another
planet from crashing into Earth, they also must deal with normal problems
that families deal with, like trying to housebreak their pet -- although
most families don't have a giant red T-Rex as a pet.

Produced by Film Roman and Marvel Animation.
